desc: Advantra Waste Solutions $11.00 an hour - Part-TimeOur medical waste disposal company is looking for someone with that special “it” factor, is that you? As a Lead Generator/Appointment Setter, you will be a pivotal part of our team by establishing and developing relationships with prospects. This position is responsible for qualifying and generating new sales leads. A dynamic personality with a drive to reach decision makers is essential. You will be scheduling over the phone conference meetings for Sales Representatives to follow up with. This position is 100% phone based and you will work remotely. please don’t apply if the phone scares you. 3+ years’ experience in phone sales is required.We are looking for someone who is professional and kind on the phone and is not afraid of the word "No". Persistence is key in this position, you will have a quota of calls per day and quota of scheduled meetings per week. You will be using a VOIP system and will be calling, leaving messages. You will be responsible for being very organized and following a specific schedule and program with the people you are calling. Scripts will be given but I would also like you to be natural. Fluent English is a must.This position is remote so you can work from anywhere, however, you must work Eastern Standard Time hours.Job Type: Part-Time - Flexible, 20-27 hours per week. You will have a strict sales goal of setting a certain number of meetings per week.3 week trial period will be given. Must have own phone, headset and computer with high-speed internet. A quiet working environment is a must.Required experience:Appointment Setting: 2 yearsOutbound/cold calling: 2 yearsWork From Home Call Center: 1 yearJob Type: Part-timeSalary: $11.00 /hour

desc: We're looking to partner with a telemarketing CALL CENTER in the U.S. or abroad.  You will be selling our Website Design and SEO (search engine optimization) services over the phone.  We pay a HIGH commission per deal closed!DO NOT BID ON THIS PROJECT IF YOU DON'T HAVE EVERYTHING ON THIS LIST BELOW!!  NO EXCEPTIONS!!Requirements:Your OWN call center equipment and auto dialer.You will manage the repsAbility for our team to QA the reps on the phone in real timeAt least 20 reps that can work 9-5pm PST USYour reps must NOT have any heavy accents... no accent is better.Reps must be able to read and write at a college level.Must have great communication skills, they will be talking to business ownersMust have prior B2B outgoing calling experienceMUST BE ABLE TO CLOSE DEALS!We want to partner with a call center that hires call center rockstars!!  Show us you have THE TEAM and we will pay you 50% commission for every SEO sale, and 20% for every Website Design Sale.  We pay the HIGHEST in the industry!!  We pay weekly, every Friday for the sales made the prior week.We want you to be ready to start in ONE WEEK!Do not ask us for hourly pay, don't ask us to pay for your autodialer.  This is PAY FOR PERFORMANCE partnership!  You'll make a LOT more with our payscale IF your reps are good closers.How Much Can You Make?Our AVERAGE SEO sale:  $600-$1,000 = You get $300-$500 commission!Our AVERAGE WEBSITE DESIGN sale: $1,200- $2,500= You get $240- $500 commission!If your reps can close at least 2 deals a week they're going to make between average $540-$1,000 per week PER REP!!  That's a MINIMUM of what they should be producing... some reps will do better.Note: These are averages... we do not sell packages any lower than the bottom pricing stated here... we do have clients that signup for SEO packages as high as $3,000!If you have the team, meet all the requirements, and can be ready in one week please PM us with your team's experience (types of campaigns B2B that they've done), years you've been in business, where you're located, and confirm you meet all the requirements.  Put $50 as your bid if you agree to our payscale and our terms.  Thank you for the interest.*Preference will be given to any companies who have sold SEO or Web Services B2B already!  If you have a slightly smaller team (under 20) but have previous successful experience selling SEO please apply!!
title: Call Center Needed - Outgoing B2B Sales

desc: My project is a privately owned public outdoor aquatic and track & field facility in a low income area with very little economic growth on the horizon. The area has been stagnate for years. The area is Danville/Pittsylvania County , VA USA.  The facility would need to have an eight lane, 25 yard pool with a separate swim lesson area. A slide and diving well area is an option as well.  It would need to be equipped with a 400 meter regulation track and select field event areas. A locker room facility, pool shop, athletic training area, small body weight training area, bike rack, triathlon transition area, full kitchen concession stand, picnic area, and USA approved flag pole memorial will all be onsite.  Revenue will be created through general admission, group admission, swim lesson fees, swim team dues, equipment rental, pool shop, concession stand, special research projects, and pool rentals/concession stand rentals.  The budget for the project will be $600,000 USD.  The pool should be a staple for the community.  Food and drinks (water being the exception) are only allowed in the concession area. Cooled bottle fillers and water fountains will be located in various locations.  The food and snacks served at the concession stand will be organic certified ingredients. Protein drinks, smoothies, powercore sports drinks, reusable water bottles, coffee, and chilled tea's will be available.  The facility will have an emphasis on supporting the athletic family.  It will do tremendous amounts of community outreach with a focus on health lifestyle and fun. It will be hub for runners, swimmers/divers, triathletes, and track & field athletes to meet and grow.I need a business proposal with a scope large enough to include construction and site options, and final decision implementation with distribution of funds. It need to be tailored to via current market research.  include correct recommendation related to business licensing   Estimated operational overhead per month.  Marketing and Advertising guidelines for the business. A functional working business plan that is unique and innovative. The project has a 4 month planning phase deadlinespectacular personal technology integration... and augmented reality demonstration worked into parts of the athletic portion of the operation.
title: Outdoor Aquatic and Track & Field Facility
